title: Strictly Come Danging's Neil Jones and Alex Scott enjoy night out
text:
Strictly’s Alex Scott and Neil Jones enjoyed a glam night out on Thursday (Picture: BACKGRID)

Alex Scott and Neil Jones have been inseparable as they work together in a bid to win the latest series of Strictly Come Dancing.

The duo were spotted making their way to Alex’s home on Thursday after rehearsals before emerging dressed to the nines for a glam night out.

The former Arsenal ladies player and the professional dancer enjoyed a swanky evening at the International Ballroom Dancing Championships at London’s Royal Albert Hall.

Perhaps Neil was hoping to give Alex would get inspired by watching the best of the best performing the most famous ballroom dances.

And the pair seemed to have a lot to discuss after the event as they made their way back to Alex’s pad at the end of the evening.

The pair are seen performing the Tango to Fleetwood Mac’s smash hit, Go Your Own Way this week but hopefully they’ll get the chances to use the ballroom skills they learnt in a future dance.

The duo attended the International Ballroom Dancing Championships at London’s Royal Albert Hall (Picture: BACKGRID)

The pair seemed to have a lot to discuss after the event as they made their way back to Alex’s pad at the end of the evening (Picture: BACKGRID)

The 2019 season is Neil’s first as a professional dancer with a partner, having previously only been on the show in the group dances.

He is known to Strictly fans though as he was married to dancer Katya Jones; the pair came under scrutiny in 2018 when Katya cheated on Neil with her celebrity partner Seann Walsh.

The pair will actually be performing the Tango to Fleetwood Mac’s smash hit, Go Your Own Way this week (Picture: BACKGRID)

The pair apologised publicly and Katya and Neil revealed they were giving their marriage another shot, but earlier in 2019 they confirmed they had split.

Katya has been paired with Mike Bushell for this year’s show.

Strictly Come Dancing airs Saturday at 6.40pm on BBC One.
